room_title: Escape room "Defcon 1" by Pendulum Escape Games in Charleston (WV)
room_description: North Korea has launched a nuclear missile at Honolulu, Hawaii. The U.S. missile defense has been infiltrated and sabotaged by the North's agents. There is hope, however. One of the saboteurs was a South Korean double agent. He has left your team clues to repair the missile defense and shoot down the missile before the Pacific Paradise is destroyed.
